sentence.text: Cyclooxygenase (generation of precursor metabolites and energy)-2 is upregulated in hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation).

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy

sentence.text: Bio-functional investigation revealed that LTBP1 inhibited cell proliferation in phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation cell lines, suggesting its potential role as a tumor suppressor in HCC.

In conclusion, this study demonstrated for the first time that enhanced generation of precursor metabolites and energy-2 expression in hepatocytes is sufficient to induce phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation through inducing promoter hypermethylation by reducing TET1, silencing tumor-suppressive genes and activating key oncogenic pathways.

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy
